ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to Microsoft SQL database insert
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will take the contents of a CSV file containing the data, each row in the CSV file representing one row to be inserted into the database.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"Directory":{"Value":"\"/example/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path for the input CSV file."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"contacts.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the input CSV file."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"example.org\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address where input CSV file is located."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP user's password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"[Demo].[contact]\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Database table into which the data will be inserted."},"MicrosoftSQLConnectionString":{"Value":"\"connectionstring\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for the Microsoft SQL database."}}
